column5: We are in a quiet, safe neighborhood. Located two blocks from the neighborhood pool (available during normal pool hours) and neighborhood parks, two blocks to grocery store and about 15 minutes from the Tx Motor Speedway. We have 3000 sq ft home w/3 bedrooms upstairs. We have 2 male roommates that work during the day renting two bedrooms upstairs full time. Bathroom is shared them. We have a fully equiped kitchen you can use. I have a home bakery, so there is almost always treats available
column8: Comfortable room upstairs in a 3000 sq ft home.
